options.group:
$$37041$$UI Options
$$37042$$Game UI OptionsCheckBoxOptionOldStyleUIEnable Old UIUse the original UI (restart required).CheckBoxOptionMinimizedUI$$43332$$Enable Minimized UI$$43333$$Turn on to minimize the screen space and information of the main UI.CheckBoxOptionMinimizedChatUI$$45745$$Enable Minimized Chat UI$$45746$$Turn on to disable the detailed player communication UI in team games.CheckBoxoptionuishowtraining$$37043$$Show Unit Training Queue$$37044$$Show all the units that are training in all buildings.CheckBoxoptionuishowgametime$$37045$$Show Game Time$$37046$$Display the game time.CheckBoxoptionuishowvillagertasks$$37047$$Show Advanced Resource View$$37048$$Display more details on resources.CheckBoxoptionuishowscore$$37049$$Show Score$$37050$$Show the score of the gameCheckBoxOptionAdvancedFormationUI$$37051$$Turn on the Advanced Formation UI.$$37052$$Show advanced formation options.CheckBoxOptionAdvancedUnitTypeInfo$$69632$$Turn on the Advanced Unit Type UI.$$69633$$Show advanced unit type information.CheckBoxOptionFriendOrFoeColor$$37055$$Enable Friend or Foe Colors$$37056$$Show all players in friend or foe colorsCheckBoxOptionEnableRobustRollover$$42097$$Show Advanced Tech Information$$42098$$Enables display of additional tech effects and statistics.CheckBoxOptionShowHPOnAlt$$65692$$(Alt) Shows hitpoint bars$$65693$$Holding (Alt) displays units hitpoints bars.CheckBoxOptionInvertControlShift$$66073$$Inverts Control/Shift functionality in Unit Select Panel.$$69621$$Inverts Control/Shift functionality in Unit Select Panel.CheckBoxOptionSnapOnFindUnit$$65766$$Find Hotkeys Snap to Unit.$$65767$$Using Find Unit Hotkeys will take you to it.SliderOptionSnapToUnitDelay$$68333$$Threshold used on Snap to Unit.$$69623$$Threshold used on Snap to Unit.$$42086$$Short$$42087$$Long0.01000.010.0falseCheckBoxOptionUIShowVisualControlGroups$$68619$$Show visual control groups.$$69622$$Show visual control groups.CheckBoxOptionWonderPowerUI$$69367$$Enable Wonder Power UI$$69368$$Turn on to show the wonder power UI.
$$37058$$HelpCheckBoxOptionTooltipEnableWorld$$37059$$Enable World Tooltips$$37060$$Display tool tips in the game.SliderOptionTooltipWorldDispTime$$37061$$Delay before the world tooltips display$$37062$$Delay before the world tooltips display.$$42086$$Short$$42087$$Long0.01500.010.0falseSliderOptionTooltipGameUIDispTime$$37063$$Delay before the game UI tooltips display$$37064$$Delay before the game UI tooltips display.$$42086$$Short$$42087$$Long0.01500.010.0falseSliderOptionTooltipBackgroundAlpha$$42708$$$$42709$$$$42710$$$$42711$$0.51.00.025false
$$37065$$RegionalCheckBoxOptionEnableIME$$37066$$Enable IME$$37067$$Enable IME input

$$37068$$Game Options
$$37069$$In-GameEditOptionSkirmishNicknameString$$37423$$Nickname$$42384$$Set the player name that is used for single player skirmish and multiplayer LAN games.16CheckBoxOptionEasyDragMilitary$$37070$$Enable Easy Drag Military$$37071$$Drag select will select only military units.SliderOptionScrollSpeed$$37072$$Scroll Speed0.010.30.01false$$37073$$Adjust the scroll speed.DropDownOptionCameraZoom$$37080$$Zoom of Camera$$37167$$Near$$37168$$Normal$$37169$$Far$$37170$$Very Far$$37081$$Control the in game zoom of the camera.CheckBoxOptionCameraRotation$$19359$$Allow Camera Rotation$$18435$$Select this option to toggle Camera Rotation.SliderOptionCameraInertiaRampTime$$43200$$Camera Acceleration Time0.0500.01.0false$$42086$$Short$$42087$$Long$$43201$$Adjust the time for the camera to accelerate to full speed when scrolling.DropDownOptionRightClickEconOnly$$42386$$Economy Gather Point Only On Right Click$$18547$$Off$$66092$$All Buildings$$66093$$Only Town Centers$$42387$$Select this option to make a right click set only the economy unit gather point. Unselected, a right click will set military and economy unit gather points.
$$37085$$AICheckBoxOptionAICanChat$$38270$$Allow Chats$$38271$$Allows the AI to chat to you.
$$37163$$MultiplayerCheckBoxOptionESOPrivacy$$43216$$Online Privacy$$43217$$Disables all incoming invites and whispers from users who are not in your Friend or Clan lists.CheckBoxOptionLanguageFilter$$37165$$Filter Chat$$37166$$Filter chat for profanity.CheckBoxOptionShowChatNotifications$$43382$$Show chat enter and exit notifications$$43383$$A chat message is displayed when a user enters or exits the chat lobby.CheckBoxOptionSaveFilterSettings$$45735$$Save Game List Filter Settings$$45736$$Remember the last Game List Filter Settings SelectedCheckBoxOptionChatSortByClans$$46635$$Group chat names by clan$$46636$$This sorts people in clans together in the chat player list

$$37086$$Graphics Options
$$37121$$Display SettingsCheckBoxOptionGrfxWindowMode$$37123$$Windowed Mode$$37124$$Enable to run the game in a window instead of full screen.DropDownOptionGrfxRes$$37125$$Video Resolution$$37126$$High resolutions have greater detail but may reduce performance.DropDownOptionGrfxSuperSampleSuper Sample50%75%100%150%200%$$37126$$High resolutions have greater detail but may reduce performance.CheckBoxOptionEnableVsync$$37140$$VSync$$37141$$Enable to sync to vertical retrace. Disabling VSync may increase frame rate but cause tearing.
$$37087$$Detail SettingsDropDownOptionGrfxParticleQuality$$37095$$Particle Quality$$37174$$Low$$37175$$Normal$$37096$$High quality settings will produce more detailed particle effects, like smoke and splashes, while low settings will increase performance.CheckBoxOptionGrfxParticleTracers$$37099$$Tracer Effects$$37100$$Enable to display ballistic tracer effects. Disabling may increase performance.SliderOptionObscuredUnitAlpha$$37074$$Obscured Unit Alpha01001$$37075$$Controls the transparency of units obscured behind other objects.CheckBoxOptionGrfxDynamicLightsDynamic LightsNeeds TooltipCheckBoxOptionGrfxCloudsCloudsNeeds Tooltip
Post ProcessingDropDownOptionGrfxAAQuality$$41678$$Anti-alias Quality$$18547$$OffFXAA$$41679$$High quality anti-alias settings will reduce more jagged edges but also reduce performance. Turn off for best performance.CheckBoxOptionEnableBlooms$$37144$$Bloom Effect$$37145$$Enable to enhance bright areas of world. Disabling may increase performance.CheckBoxOptionGrfxSSAOSSAONeeds Tooltip
QualityDropDownOptionGrfxFoliageQualityFoliage$$37171$$Low$$37172$$Medium$$37173$$HighNeeds TooltipDropDownOptionGrfxShaderQualityShaders$$37171$$Low$$37172$$Med$$37173$$High$$41647$$Very High$$41648$$High quality settings provide more graphical detail and effects, while lower quality settings increase performance.DropDownOptionGrfxWaterQualityWater$$37171$$Low$$37172$$Medium$$37173$$HighNeeds TooltipDropDownOptionGrfxShadowDetailShadows$$18547$$Off$$37172$$Medium$$37173$$High$$41647$$Very High$$37107$$High quality settings provide more detailed shadows, while lower quality settings increase performance.DropDownOptionGrfxTextureQualityTextures$$37171$$Low$$37172$$Medium$$37173$$High$$41651$$High resolution textures have more detail, while low resolution increases performance.

$$37148$$Sound Options
$$37149$$SoundCheckBoxoptionsoundonoff$$37150$$Sound On$$37151$$Turn sound on or off.Slideroptionsoundlevel$$37152$$Volume010.01$$37153$$Adjust the sound volume.Slideroptionambientsoundlevel$$37154$$Ambient Sound Volume010.01$$37155$$Adjust the ambient sound volume.CheckBoxoptionSoundParamEQOnOff$$37156$$Equalizer Effects$$37157$$Determines whether certain off-screen sounds can utilize special effect processing.CheckBoxOptionSoundAllowTaunts$$37083$$Allow Player Taunts$$37084$$Allow player taunts.Slideroptionsoundchatvolume$$41620$$Taunts and AI Chats Volume010.01$$41621$$Adjust the taunts and AI chats volume.
$$37158$$MusicCheckBoxoptionmusiconoff$$37159$$Music On$$37160$$Turn music on and off.Slideroptionmusiclevel$$37161$$Music Volume010.01$$37162$$Adjust the music volume.
